item.title: Sonic Youth’s Thurston Moore Signs Attawalpa, the Musical Project of Lena Dunham’s Husband and ‘Too Much’ Co-Creator Luis Felber
item.description: Attawalpa, the musical project of Luis Felber — who co-created and was behind the music for wife Lena Dunham’s Netflix series “Too Much” — has signed with Sonic Youth guitarist Thurs
